thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | www.flashbay.com
thread.title: Megan Garon

author: Megan Garon
title: Megan Garon
text:
The customer service shown from the initial Quote: request through delivery of the product went above and beyond my expectations. They sent me a sample package without being prompted and were very speedy in correspondence and delivery.
The product is great too. We have had a lot of compliments on our flash drives. If I had one request, it would be to have more material options for each style of flash drive. ie. the Ellipse could come in brushed chrome and the slick metal, etc.
